timeline.message: #3633 [structured-data branch] In depictions selection screen, suggest nearby items - for empty search terms show nearby items for depictions
#3633 [structured-data branch] In depictions selection screen, suggest nearby items - use linear radii progression to search for places

timeline.bodyText: Great! Actually whenever I need to search for items near a point, I always use linear radii progression, as it results in a square surface progression.
